name: TimeZoid 2
description:
→ Play TIMEZOID 2 - for 1.99€

Is a game with no players possible?  Well... I made one TimeZoid

I pulled out the good on' Unity game engine to build this game. After some serious struggle, I eventually developed a possible game idea and figured out how to program it (didn't actually end up using cellular automata, but it kind of mimics it).

First i made TIMEZOID 1 You can play for free here: https://techcommander.itch.io/timezoid

Thank you for whatching and playing my game :)
